product_name: Cordillera Snow Flurry Down Skirt - Special Buy
long_description: The Cordillera Snow Flurry Down skirt is ready for adventures in the cold. Nylon fabric goes on easy and resists wrinkles. Premium 800-fill-power goose down is extremely compressible and offers exceptional warmth for its weight. Polyester lining easily slides over under layers, such as leggings or ski pants. Skirt features a side zipper for easy on and off; zippered front pocket for stashing small items. Special buy.
short_description: The Cordillera Snow Flurry Down skirt is ready for adventures in the cold.
